title: Bihar seeks investment in maize sector amid ethanol boom
description: Bihar Agriculture Minister Mangal Pandey has urged private sector investment in hybrid maize seed production and warehouse facilities. The state aims to cultivate maize on 10 lakh hectares this year, driven by high market prices and ethanol demand. Bihar's ethanol production capacity is set to increase, requiring more maize.
